features.title: Never get lost in your grow again
features.subtitle: Reminders, stage organization, automatic video stickers and everything a grower needs to stay in control without complications.

journal.title: Works your way
journal.description: Voice notes, photo or video records, customize as you want. Nothing is mandatory â€” but everything can be logged.

voice.title: From bucket to greenhouse
voice.description: Whether your grow is in a closet or the most advanced system, My Bud adapts. We help you get the best from what you already have.

alerts.title: Life days and stages always visible
alerts.description: Know exactly what phase each plant is in and how many days until each important stage.

guides.title: Automatic stickers on plant videos
guides.description: Each video automatically gets a sticker with stage, date and plant info. Perfect for Instagram.

appShowcase.title: See My Bud in action
appShowcase.subtitle: Click on the features to see how My Bud simplifies every stage of your grow

dashboard.title: Recurring tasks with reminders
dashboard.desc: Set up tasks that repeat automatically and get reminders at the right time. Never forget watering or nutrition again.

voice.title: Voice, text, photo or video recording
voice.desc: Record your way: speak, write, photograph or film. Everything gets organized automatically in the plant's history.

qr.title: QR Code per plant
qr.desc: Point the camera and the app recognizes your plant instantly. No confusion, everything organized.

alerts.title: Complete plant history
alerts.desc: See your plant's entire journey in an organized timeline. Every record, photo and video in the right place.

journal.title: Organized grow timeline
journal.desc: Visualize all your grow progress in a clear and organized timeline. From planting to harvest.

identityTrust.description: My Bud was born from the frustration of forgetting the last watering, missing the flip to flower day or confusing genetics. It's a smart diary that understands your routine â€” with lightness, privacy and respect for your freedom to grow.

private.title: 100% private
private.desc: Your data stays on your device. Always.

community.title: Community-built
community.desc: Developed with real feedback from growers.

tested.title: Grower-tested
tested.desc: Validated in practice, in real grows.

testimonials.title: Loved by growers
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. See what the first testers are saying.

faq1.question: Is the app free?
faq1.answer: You'll be able to use it for free, with a plant limit. Those who join the beta get premium access unlocked for 6 months.

faq2.question: Does it work offline?
faq2.answer: Not yet. But we're optimizing everything to work fast and light even with poor internet.

faq3.question: Is it safe to use?
faq3.answer: The real talk: 100% anonymity doesn't exist. We save as little as possible, but your IP still goes through our servers. Unfortunately, silence is still the best protection for growers â€” and we respect that. Nothing is shared. The law requires keeping some data, and we follow what's necessary. But you decide what to record or not.

faq4.question: Do I need to show my plants?
faq4.answer: No. You can record everything without taking a single photo. Everything is optional.

faq5.question: Can I use it just to organize without logging everything?
faq5.answer: Of course. If you just want to see flower days and know when to harvest, that's already worth it.
